spriter.name: Scml
spriter.description: Load and playback SCML files from BrashMonkey's Spriter animation toolkit.

scml-file.name: SCML file
scml-file.desc: The Spriter project file to load (e.g. .scml / .scon).

starting-entity.name: Starting entity
starting-entity.desc: Optional: choose an entity to start on.

starting-animation.name: Starting animation
starting-animation.desc: Optional: choose an animation to start playing.

starting-opacity.name: Starting opacity
starting-opacity.desc: Initial opacity percentage to apply to the instance.

draw-self.name: Draw self
draw-self.desc: Whether the object should render the animation itself (self-draw) or drive separate Construct objects.

nickname-in-c2.name: Nickname (C2)
nickname-in-c2.desc: Legacy property used by Construct 2 projects.

blend-mode.name: Blend mode
blend-mode.desc: Controls premultiplied alpha handling when self-drawing.

draw-debug.name: Draw debug
draw-debug.desc: Draw overlay guides for troubleshooting pose assembly (sprite bounds, sprite pivot dots, and bone lines).

repair-legacy-self-draw.name: Repair legacy self-draw
repair-legacy-self-draw.desc: Extract embedded atlas frame images to Project Files so old self-draw projects can render in the SDK2 runtime path.

on-ready.description: Triggered when the Spriter project file has finished loading.

on-load-failed.description: Triggered when the Spriter project file fails to load.

is-ready.description: Check if the Spriter project file has finished loading successfully.

on-anim-finished.description: Triggered when the named animation finishes.

onanimfinished0.description: Legacy alias for On animation finished.

onanyanimfinished1.description: Legacy alias for On any animation finished.

compare-current-key.description: Compare the current mainline key index.

current-key-frame-is.name: Comparison
current-key-frame-is.desc: How to compare the current key.

frame.name: Frame
frame.desc: The key index to compare against.

comparecurrentkey2.description: Legacy alias for Compare current key.

current_key_frame_is0.name: Comparison
current_key_frame_is0.desc: How to compare the current key.

frame1.name: Frame
frame1.desc: The key index to compare against.

current-animation-time-is.name: Comparison
current-animation-time-is.desc: How to compare the current time.

time-format.name: Time format
time-format.desc: Whether the time value is milliseconds or a ratio.

comparecurrenttime3.description: Legacy alias for Compare current time.

current_animation_time_is0.name: Comparison
current_animation_time_is0.desc: How to compare the current time.

time_format4.name: Time format
time_format4.desc: Whether the time value is milliseconds or a ratio.

compare-animation.description: Check if the current animation matches the given name.

compare-entity.description: Check if the current entity matches the given name.

animation-paused.description: Check if playback is currently paused.

animation-looping.description: Check if the current animation is set to loop.

is-mirrored.display-text: Object is mirrored on X axis
is-mirrored.description: Check if the object is currently mirrored on the X axis.

ismirrored10.display-text: Object is mirrored on X axis (legacy)

is-flipped.display-text: Object is flipped on Y axis
is-flipped.description: Check if the object is currently flipped on the Y axis.

isflipped11.display-text: Object is flipped on Y axis (legacy)

on-sound-triggered.description: Triggered when the current animation triggers a sound key.

onsoundtriggered7.description: Legacy alias for On sound triggered.

on-sound-volume-change-triggered.description: Triggered when a soundline's volume changes.

onsoundvolumechangetriggered8.description: Legacy alias for On sound volume change.

on-sound-panning-change-triggered.description: Triggered when a soundline's panning changes.

onsoundpanningchangetriggered9.description: Legacy alias for On sound panning change.

compare-second-animation.description: Compare the secondary animation used for blending.

animation-name.name: Animation name
animation-name.desc: The secondary animation name to compare.

comparesecondanimation.description: Legacy alias for Compare second animation.

animation0.name: Animation name
animation0.desc: The secondary animation name to compare.

action-point-exists.description: Check if an action point/object timeline exists in the current pose.

point-name.name: Point name
point-name.desc: The action point timeline name to check.

actionpointexists12.description: Legacy alias for Action point exists.

name0.name: Point name
name0.desc: The action point timeline name to check.

object-exists.description: Check if a Spriter object timeline exists in the current pose.

object-name.name: Object name
object-name.desc: The Spriter object timeline name to check.

name0.name: Object name
name0.desc: The Spriter object timeline name to check.

compare-z-elevation.description: Compare this instance's Z elevation value.

outside-padded-viewport.description: True when the Spriter object position is outside the configured padded viewport.

outsidepaddedviewport13.description: Legacy alias for Outside padded viewport.

on-event-triggered.description: Triggered when a Spriter eventline with the given name is fired.

oneventtriggered14.description: Legacy alias for On event triggered.

tag-active.description: Check if a tag is active on the current animation or on a specific timeline/soundline/eventline.

object-name.name: Object name
object-name.desc: Optional timeline/soundline/eventline name. Leave empty for animation meta.

where-to-start.name: Start from
where-to-start.desc: How to choose the starting playback time.

blend-duration.name: Blend duration
blend-duration.desc: Blend duration in milliseconds (legacy field; blending is currently ignored).

where_to_start_playing_this_animation6.name: Start from
where_to_start_playing_this_animation6.desc: How to choose the starting playback time.

speed-ratio.name: Speed ratio
speed-ratio.desc: Playback speed multiplier (1 is normal speed).

setplaybackspeedratio1.description: Legacy alias for Set playback speed ratio.

set-animation-loop.description: Set whether the current animation loops.

loop-animation.name: Loop mode
loop-animation.desc: Play once or loop the animation.

setanimationloop3.description: Legacy alias for Set animation loop.

loop_animation2.name: Loop mode
loop_animation2.desc: Play once or loop the animation.

set-animation-time.description: Set playback time for the current animation.

time-units.name: Time units
time-units.desc: How to interpret the time value.

setanimationtime4.description: Legacy alias for Set animation time.

time_units2.name: Time units
time_units2.desc: How to interpret the time value.

play-anim-to.description: Play towards a target key/time/ratio and stop there.

units.name: Target units
units.desc: Whether the target is keyframe index, time, or time ratio.

target.name: Target
target.desc: The target value in the selected units.

playanimto7.description: Legacy alias for Play animation to.

3.name: Target units
3.desc: Whether the target is keyframe index, time, or time ratio.

target4.name: Target
target4.desc: The target value in the selected units.

set-entity.description: Switch to a different entity and optionally an animation.

animation-name.name: Animation name
animation-name.desc: Animation to play (leave empty to keep current animation name when possible).

set-object-scale-ratio.display-text: Set scale ratio to {0}, X: {1}, Y: {2}
set-object-scale-ratio.description: Set global Spriter scale and optional X/Y flip state.

scale-ratio.name: Scale ratio
scale-ratio.desc: Global scale ratio applied to Spriter playback.

flip-x-axis.name: X axis
flip-x-axis.desc: Whether to flip on X axis.

flip-y-axis.name: Y axis
flip-y-axis.desc: Whether to flip on Y axis.

setobjectscaleratio2.display-text: Set scale ratio to {0}, X: {1}, Y: {2} (legacy)
setobjectscaleratio2.description: Legacy alias for Set object scale ratio.

scale_ratio0.name: Scale ratio
scale_ratio0.desc: Global scale ratio applied to Spriter playback.

flip_x_axis3.name: X axis
flip_x_axis3.desc: Whether to flip on X axis.

flip_y_axis6.name: Y axis
flip_y_axis6.desc: Whether to flip on Y axis.

mirror-x-axis.name: X axis
mirror-x-axis.desc: Whether to mirror the X axis.

setobjectxflip11.description: Legacy alias for Set object X flip.

mirror_x_axis2.name: X axis
mirror_x_axis2.desc: Whether to mirror the X axis.

flip-y-axis.name: Y axis
flip-y-axis.desc: Whether to flip the Y axis.

setobjectyflip12.description: Legacy alias for Set object Y flip.

flip_y_axis2.name: Y axis
flip_y_axis2.desc: Whether to flip the Y axis.

associate-type-with-name.description: Associate a Construct object type with a named Spriter object (use in On Ready).

object-type.name: Object type
object-type.desc: The Construct object type to associate.

spriter-name.name: Spriter object name
spriter-name.desc: The name of the Spriter object (as named in the Spriter project).

associatetypewithname666.description: Legacy alias for Associate type with name.

object0.name: Object type
object0.desc: The Construct object type to associate.

name1.name: Spriter object name
name1.desc: The name of the Spriter object.

pin-c3-object-to-spriter-object.list-name: Pin C3 object to Spriter object
pin-c3-object-to-spriter-object.description: Persistently attach a Construct instance to a Spriter object each tick.

spriter-object-name.name: Spriter object name
spriter-object-name.desc: The name of the Spriter object to pin to.

pinC2ObjectToSpriterObject27.description: Legacy alias for pinning an object to a Spriter object.

spriter_object5.name: Spriter object name
spriter_object5.desc: The name of the Spriter object to pin to.

set-c3-object-to-spriter-object.list-name: Set C3 object to Spriter object
set-c3-object-to-spriter-object.description: One-shot: set a Construct instance to a Spriter object's position/angle this tick only.

spriter-object-name.name: Spriter object name
spriter-object-name.desc: The name of the Spriter object to match.

setc2objecttospriterobject21.description: Legacy alias for one-shot object sync.

spriter_object5.name: Spriter object name
spriter_object5.desc: The name of the Spriter object to match.

unpin-c3-object-from-spriter-object.list-name: Unpin C3 object from Spriter object
unpin-c3-object-from-spriter-object.description: Remove a pinned Construct object from a Spriter object.

spriter-object-name.name: Spriter object name
spriter-object-name.desc: The Spriter object name to unpin from (empty to unpin from all).

unpinC2ObjectFromSpriterObject25.description: Legacy alias for unpinning an object.

spriter_object5.name: Spriter object name
spriter_object5.desc: The Spriter object name to unpin from.

unpin-all-from-spriter-object.description: Remove all pinned objects from a Spriter object.

spriter-object-name.name: Spriter object name
spriter-object-name.desc: The Spriter object name to unpin from (empty to unpin all).

spriter_object5.name: Spriter object name
spriter_object5.desc: The Spriter object name to unpin from (empty to unpin all).

set-second-anim.description: Set a secondary animation for blending.

animation-name.name: Animation name
animation-name.desc: The animation name to blend to.

setsecondanim13.description: Legacy alias for Set second animation.

animation0.name: Animation name
animation0.desc: The animation name to blend to.

set-anim-blend-ratio.description: Set blend ratio between primary and secondary animations.

setanimblendratio14.description: Legacy alias for Set animation blend ratio.

stopsecondanim15.description: Legacy alias for Stop second animation.

find-spriter-object.description: Set FoundObject to the matching Spriter timeline name for the picked object.

c2-object.name: Object
c2-object.desc: The object to look up in current associations.

findspriterobject23.description: Legacy alias for Find Spriter object.

c2_object0.name: Object
c2_object0.desc: The object to look up in current associations.

setvisible16.description: Legacy visibility action used by older projects.

setopacity18.description: Legacy opacity action used by older projects.

set-ignore-global-time-scale.display-text: Set ignore global time scale to {0}
set-ignore-global-time-scale.description: Control whether animation playback ignores layout time scale.

ignore-layout-time-scale.name: Ignore time scale
ignore-layout-time-scale.desc: Whether to ignore the layout time scale.

setignoreglobaltimescale22.display-text: Set ignore global time scale to {0} (legacy)
setignoreglobaltimescale22.description: Legacy alias for Set ignore global time scale.

ignore_layout_time_scale?2.name: Ignore time scale
ignore_layout_time_scale?2.desc: Whether to ignore the layout time scale.

stop-resume-setting-layer.description: Stop or resume automatic layer syncing for associated objects.

stopresumesettinglayer24.description: Legacy alias for sprite layer update mode.

stop-resume-setting-visibility-for-objec.description: Stop or resume automatic visibility syncing for associated objects.

stopresumesettingvisibilityforobjects.description: Legacy alias for sprite visibility update mode.

stop-resume-setting-collisions-for-objec.description: Stop or resume automatic collision syncing for associated objects.

stopresumesettingcollisionsforobjects.description: Legacy alias for sprite collision update mode.

set-automatic-pausing.display-text: Set automatic pausing to [b]{0}[/b] (L:{1} R:{2} T:{3} B:{4})
set-automatic-pausing.description: Configure automatic pausing based on the object position relative to the viewport.

automatic-pause-settings.name: Automatic pause settings
automatic-pause-settings.desc: Choose how playback should pause outside the padded viewport.

items.pause all playback automatically when sc: Pause all playback automatically when SCML object position is outside padded display area
items.pause all playback except sound automati: Pause all playback except sound automatically when SCML object position is outside padded display area

left-padding.name: Left padding
left-padding.desc: Padding added to the left viewport edge.

right-padding.name: Right padding
right-padding.desc: Padding added to the right viewport edge.

top-padding.name: Top padding
top-padding.desc: Padding added to the top viewport edge.

bottom-padding.name: Bottom padding
bottom-padding.desc: Padding added to the bottom viewport edge.

setautomaticpausing17.display-text: Set automatic pausing to [b]{0}[/b] (L:{1} R:{2} T:{3} B:{4}) (legacy)
setautomaticpausing17.description: Legacy alias for Set automatic pausing.

automatic_pause_settings3.name: Automatic pause settings
automatic_pause_settings3.desc: Choose how playback should pause outside the padded viewport.

items.pause all playback automatically when sc: Pause all playback automatically when SCML object position is outside padded display area
items.pause all playback except sound automati: Pause all playback except sound automatically when SCML object position is outside padded display area

left_padding4.name: Left padding
left_padding4.desc: Padding added to the left viewport edge.

right_padding5.name: Right padding
right_padding5.desc: Padding added to the right viewport edge.

top_padding6.name: Top padding
top_padding6.desc: Padding added to the top viewport edge.

bottom_padding7.name: Bottom padding
bottom_padding7.desc: Padding added to the bottom viewport edge.

append-char-map.description: Apply a character map by name.

appendcharmap10.description: Legacy alias for Append character map.

remove-char-map.description: Remove a previously applied character map.

removeCharMap.description: Legacy alias for Remove character map.

removeallcharmaps9.description: Legacy alias for Remove all character maps.

override-object-component.description: Override a timeline object component value.

overrideobjectcomponent19.description: Legacy alias for Override object component.

override-bones-with-ik.display-text: Override IK parent [i]{0}[/i], child [i]{1}[/i], target ({2}, {3}), extra {4}
override-bones-with-ik.description: Set a persistent IK override for a parent/child bone pair.

overrideboneswithik20.display-text: Override IK parent [i]{0}[/i], child [i]{1}[/i], target ({2}, {3}), extra {4} (legacy)
overrideboneswithik20.description: Legacy alias for Override bones with IK.

load-from-url.description: Load Spriter project data from URL or from the supplied SCON text.

url.name: URL
url.desc: URL to fetch SCON data from when SCON text is empty.

SetZElevation.description: Legacy alias for Set Z elevation.

last-error.description: Get the last Spriter load error message (empty string if none).

time.description: Get the current playback time (in seconds) for the selected animation.

key.description: Get the current mainline key index.

time-ratio.description: Get the current playback time as a ratio of animation length.

play-to.description: Get the active play-to target time in milliseconds, or -1 if none.

play-to-time-left.description: Get milliseconds remaining until the play-to target is reached.

animation-length.description: Get the current animation length in milliseconds.

speed-ratio.description: Get the current playback speed ratio.

scale-ratio.description: Get the global Spriter scale ratio.

object-count.description: Get the number of sprite objects in the currently evaluated pose.

entity-name.description: Get the name of the currently selected entity.

animation-name.description: Get the name of the currently selected animation.

triggered-sound.description: Get the most recently triggered sound name.

triggered-sound-tag.description: Get the soundline tag/name associated with the latest sound trigger or change.

sound-volume.description: Get the current volume value for a soundline tag.

sound-panning.description: Get the current panning value for a soundline tag.

blend-ratio.description: Get the current animation blend ratio (0-1).

second-animation-name.description: Get the current secondary animation name (if any).

point-x.description: Get the current X position for an action point timeline.

point-name.name: Point name
point-name.desc: The action point timeline name to query.

point-y.description: Get the current Y position for an action point timeline.

point-name.name: Point name
point-name.desc: The action point timeline name to query.

point-angle.description: Get the current angle (degrees) for an action point timeline.

point-name.name: Point name
point-name.desc: The action point timeline name to query.

object-x.description: Get the current X position for a Spriter object timeline.

object-name.name: Object name
object-name.desc: The Spriter object timeline name to query.

object-y.description: Get the current Y position for a Spriter object timeline.

object-name.name: Object name
object-name.desc: The Spriter object timeline name to query.

object-angle.description: Get the current angle (degrees) for a Spriter object timeline.

object-name.name: Object name
object-name.desc: The Spriter object timeline name to query.

found-object.description: Get the Spriter object name found by FindSpriterObject.

get-opacity.description: Get this Spriter instance opacity in percent (0-100).

bbox-left.description: Get the current bounding-box left edge.

bbox-right.description: Get the current bounding-box right edge.

bbox-top.description: Get the current bounding-box top edge.

bbox-bottom.description: Get the current bounding-box bottom edge.

total-z-elevation.description: Get this instance's total Z elevation.

val.description: Get the current Spriter variable value by name (optionally scoped to an object timeline).
